JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Dishwasher wanted

Knudhule Badehotel is looking for a dishwasher for evening and weekend work. You will join our team of dishwashers who work regular shifts according to a fixed schedule.

To ensure a high level of service towards our guests, high quality dishwashing is important. As a dishwasher, you will therefore be working with one of the most important tasks at the hotel to the benefit of our guests and your colleagues in the kitchen and the restaurant.

We expect:

  • That you are in good physical shape
  • That you have the physique to handle cutlery and large pots
  • That you want to do your best to ensure a great experience for our guests
  • That you have a well-developed sense of hygiene and cleanliness
  • That you can communicate in Danish or English.

We offer:

  • Good salary as per agreement and your qualifications
  • Free accommodation for up to 3 months for EU citizens who want to settle in Denmark
  • Good working environment
  • Opportunity to combine work with studies
  • Lots of great colleagues.

About the hotel

Knudhule Badehotel is located outside the town of Ry overlooking the beautiful lake Knudsø. It offers a la carte, stays, parties, and conferences. The hotel has 30 rooms and cabins and has room for parties with up to 250 guests. Our very popular a la carte restaurant Gastronomisk Institut focuses on wine and gastronomy and has a well-stocked wine cellar. The hotel has been run by Dean Jespersen and Anders Kalstrup since 2013. It has 2 stars in Den Danske Spiseguide (the Danish Dining Guide) and is open all year.
